WiFi¶

Example Usage¶

// Basic
App.init_wifi("YOUR_SSID", "YOUR_PASSWORD");
// Manual IP
auto *wifi = App.init_wifi("YOUR_SSID", "YOUR_PASSWORD");
wifi->set_manual_ip(ManualIP{
    .static_ip = IPAddress(192, 168, 178, 42),
    .gateway = IPAddress(192, 168, 178, 1),
    .subnet = IPAddress(255, 255, 255, 0)
});

API Reference¶

WiFiComponent¶

class esphomelib::WiFiComponent¶

This component is responsible for managing the ESP WiFi interface.

Inherits from esphomelib::Component

Public Functions

WiFiComponent(std::string ssid, std::string password, std::string hostname)¶

Construct a WiFiComponent.

Parameters
  • ssid: The station ssid.
  • password: The station password, leave empty for an open network.
  • hostname: The hostname of this device, leave empty for standard one.

void set_hostname(const std::string &hostname)¶

Set the hostname, automatically sanitizes it.

void set_manual_ip(Optional<ManualIP> manual_ip)¶

Manually set a static IP for this WiFi interface.

void set_password(const std::string &password)¶

Setup WiFi interface.

WIFI setup_priority.

Reconnect WiFi if required.

Waits for the WiFi class to return a connected state.
